classes.cCustomNote: Any free elective can go here. 8 units of elective credit required. Recommended: SCM 150 workshops (1) for Math/Science courses be taken in your first year.

Any free elective can go here. 8 units of elective credit required. Recommended: SCM 150 workshops (1) for Math/Science courses be taken in your first year.

One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, C1, C2, C3, C4, C1-C5 elective, D1, D2, D3, D4, D5, and F. C4, D5, and F should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). Refer to online catalog for GE course selection, United States Cultural Pluralism (USCP) and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR). USCP requirement can be satisfied by some (but not all) courses within GE categories: C3, C4, D1, D3, D4, D5, or F.
Any free elective can go here. 8 units of elective credit required. Recommended: SCM 150 workshops (1) for Math/Science courses be taken in your first year.
Choose one of the following: CHEM313, CHEM371. CHEM371 suggested for students who plan to pursue graduate school or a health professions career.

Any Advisor Approved Elective can go here. To be chosen with faculty advisor approval. Total of 19 units required. Limited to a total of 4 units from BIO 400, 450, 462, 463. Care must be taken to ensure compliance with the '60 units of upper-division' requirement.
